data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bertaco, Vinicius A. (2014): Astyanax douradilho, a new characid fish from the rio Tramandaí system, southern Brazil (Characiformes: Characidae). Zootaxa 3794 (3): 492-500, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3794.3.10
